mutants.original_line: cnt = 1
mutants.mutated_line: cnt = 2
mutants.code:
def lexicographically_smallest_water_volumes(n, volumes):
    ans = []
    for ai in volumes:
        cnt = 2
        while ans and ai * ans[-1][0] <= ans[-1][1] * cnt:
            (c, r) = ans.pop()
            ai += r
            cnt += c
        ans.append((cnt, ai))
    result = []
    for (i, res) in ans:
        avg_volume = res / i
        result.extend([avg_volume] * i)
    return result
